name: C-jump
description:
Hi there! Looking for a simple game?

Now you found it!

C-Jump it's a simple game that I made, that is the first game that I did, it's an Beta build but I think that I will upgrade it!

Controls:

A- Left

D- Right

(PS: Please don't ask for jump, the game looks hard for the first time but it's medium.)

(PS2: If you want the numbers removed, I will :) )
